description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Burst the bubbles by connecting at least three of the same type.  Earn bonuses for speed and breaking off chunks of other bubbles.  Work your way through the many levels and climb the online high score tables.  Update 2 : Added Top Tips video to full game.  Fixed bug in Global High Scores system.
